auth.what_is_platespottr_description: Platespottr is a game where you have to find license plates in a sequence of numbers, also known as plate spotting. Add numbers and compete with your friends (optional) to see who can find all the plates first! Collect your crew, see your statistics and see if you can reach the top of the prize list. A simple but fun game for everyone who likes simple games.

game_rules.title: Game rules
game_rules.order_description: You must find all numbers in order from 001 to 999. You can't skip or 'save' numbers for later.
game_rules.real_plates_description: The number must be seen on a real Swedish license plate in real life—not on TV, phone, poster, or other images.
game_rules.number_format_description: Only numbers without a letter at the end count. Example: ABC123 is valid, but ABC12A is not. Personalized plates do not count.
game_rules.traffic_safety_description: Always be careful when searching for numbers in traffic. Your safety comes before the game.
game_rules.press_for_seconds_description: Hold the button for {seconds} second to register the number. This makes it easy and safe to register the number.

important_safety_rules.title: Important safety rules
important_safety_rules.rule_1: Never drive while looking for numbers
important_safety_rules.rule_2: As a passenger – help the driver focus on the road
important_safety_rules.rule_3: Use safe places like parking lots and bus stops
important_safety_rules.rule_4: Be aware of your surroundings when moving in traffic
important_safety_rules.rule_5: Respect other people's property and privacy
important_safety_rules.remember_safety: Remember: Safety always comes before the game. Be responsible!
important_safety_rules.understood: Yes, I have read and understood the rules, and that all data is handled according to GDPR.
